content: {"Name": "Capital Green Apartments", "Entity_Id": 3954, "Category": "Mobile Food Resources", "Subcategory": "Veggie Mobile\u00ae", "Organization": "Capital Roots", "More_Information": "We recommend calling to verify times and locations\r\nCall or email at least one day ahead to place your order.\r\nEmail: mobilemarket@capitalroots.org", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "", "Address": "400 Central Avenue", "City": "Albany", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12206", "Phone": "518-274-8685", "Hours_of_Operation": "Thursday 11:30am-12:15pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "Cash, EBT/SNAP & FMNP, Double Up Food Bucks, Fresh Connect Checks, Cash, Credit, Debit", "Website": "https://www.capitalroots.org/veggie-mobile/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 1, "Latitude": "42.667948848184416", "Longitude": "-73.77654207582476", "Last_Updated": "06-10-2025", "icon": "marker-795548", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
